replies.body: Does it bring you to the login page, you login, and then it says "Logging On...." Then brings you to a popup that says connection error?

The server had some downtime for maintenance.  I recommend bookmarking our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page to stay updated on server issues and maintenance.  The server is back online now!
It's not maintenance, severs have been up for hours and i havent been able to login since they went up.

of course mate and its not maintenance...they seem to be just bots sent random replies to us...now its on for me and i can log in...i couldn't for hours and all these riot bots say do this or that...like it is our problem...WAKE UP people...THEY GET RICH..THEY DON'T CARE ABOUT PEOPLE.

Stop saying lies members of the industry. Yall sold ur soul to the Antichrist already...Server was online from early mornging. There was a problem and u could not accept it..U take money from all these kids and their parents and feed them lies. This is my opinion. Now bb

Ok Riot please stop tell us about this problem to do this or that like it is our problem...The problem is yours.. Instead of doing this please inform us about whats going on and when we will be able to log in again. Thank You
Are we going to log in ?!!! I cant log in from yesterday night
